Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: john decker
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have ever risked being the first to try out a product; normally I prefer to pore over other's reviews and make my decision from there. At the price these lenses are however, I bought...thinking if they don't perform, I will sell em on E Bay.I like them....and so does my Nikon D5100.The quality is much better than one should ever expect....at much higher prices.I afixed all of them to my kit 18/55, and to a 55/200.....nice fits...all over.The close up kit stacks right and proper.The hood screws firm onto the 55/200...but on the kit 18/55 it fits rather sloppy, I can make do with that; besides I only look at the hood as a bonus.The Q tips, cleaning solution, and cloth....are still packaged, I guess they will work if I get a need for them.I would be remiss if I didn't mention that when I turned the filters onto my lenses, they seemed to emit a faint squeak as the threads engaged. I remedied that by rubbing a very light coat of talcum onto the male thread; they run quite smoothly now.I feel quite satisfied....and recommend this product. The delivery was Very timely.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Essentials You Need To Take Full Advantage Of Your New Digital Camera
High Resolution 3PC Filter Kit: Clear Filter (UV), Polarizer Filter (PL), Fluorescent (F-DL)
Lens Hood - Protects your lens and reduces flare.
52MM Close Up Lens Kit Includes +1 +2 +4 +10
Hard Rubber Lens Hood & Electronics Deluxe Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: 52mm Bundle Lens Accessory Kit For Nikon D3100 D5100 Digital SLR Camera With 18-55mm, 55-200mm Or 50mm Nikon Lenses. Includes 52mm 3pc High Resolution Multi Coated Filter Kit + 52mm Lens Hood + 4pc +1 +2 +4 +10 52mm Close Up Filter Set
